name: She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
summary: 布鲁斯·班纳的表妹珍妮佛·沃特斯，作为刑事律师的她在一次重伤后接受了班纳的输血而产生异变，成为了女浩克。
info:
• 中文名: 女浩克
  • 放送星期: 星期四
  • 原作: Marvel Entertainment、Stan Lee
  • 别名: She-Hulk
  • 别名: 女绿巨人
  • 集数: 9
  • 开始: 2022-08-18
  • 结束: 2022-10-13
  • 类型: 动作 / 科幻 / 冒险
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 每集长: 30分钟
  • 电视网: Disney+
  • 首播国家: 美国
  • 台湾名称: 律师女浩克
  • 港澳名称: 变形女侠：律政英雌
  • imdb_id: tt10857160
  • 导演: 凯特·凯罗 / 阿奴·瓦利亚
  • 编剧: 高扬
  • 主演: 塔提阿娜·玛斯拉尼
  • 配角: 马克·鲁弗洛 / 蒂姆·罗斯 / 本尼迪克特·王 / 金格·贡萨加 / 贾米拉·贾米尔 / 乔恩·巴斯 / 芮妮·戈兹贝里 / 乔什·塞加拉 / Nicholas Cirillo / Jason m Edwards / Abigail Esmena / 罗伯特·廷斯利 / Kimi Price Queguiner / Krystin Goodwin

eps.name: A Normal Amount of Rage
eps.desc: Jen Walter's world is turned upside down after a freak accident leaves her with superpowers.

eps.name: Superhuman Law
eps.desc: Jen is hired at a prestigious law firm but must practice as She-Hulk and rep a complicated client.

eps.name: The People vs. Emil Blonsky
eps.desc: She-Hulk represents Emil Blonsky aka The Abomination, but his parole hearing doesn't go as planned.

eps.name: Is This Not Real Magic?
eps.desc: She-Hulk's new client Wong is suing a magician for unauthorized use of the Mystic Arts.

eps.name: Mean, Green, and Straight Poured into These Jeans
eps.desc: She-Hulk discovers Titania owns the name "She-Hulk" and is suing her for trademark infringement.

eps.name: Just Jen
eps.desc: Jen is a bridesmaid at a friend's wedding, a stressful event compounded by uniquely She-Hulk issues.

eps.name: The Retreat
eps.desc: Jen visits Blonsky's wellness retreat, meets new friends and gets in touch with her inner She-Hulk.

eps.name: Ribbit and Rip It
eps.desc: She-Hulk represents Leap-Frog who was injured due to a malfunction in his custom-made super suit.

eps.name: Whose Show is This
eps.desc: Jen finds herself in trouble with the law and struggles to pick up the pieces of her life.
